text: Ikh prorok skazal im: «Znameniyem yego tsarstviya stanet to, chto k vam yavitsya sunduk s umirotvoreniyem ot vashego Gospoda. V nem budet to, chto ostalos' posle sem'i Musy (Moiseya) i sem'i Kharuna (Aarona). Yego prinesut angely. Eto budet znameniyem dlya vas, yesli tol'ko vy yavlyayetes' veruyushchimi»
